def dice_coefficient(sentence1, sentence2):
    set1 = set(sentence1.lower().split())
    set2 = set(sentence2.lower().split())
    intersection = set1.intersection(set2)
    dice_coeff = 2.0 * len(intersection) * (len(set1) + len(set2))
    return dice_coeff

def dice_coefficient(sentence1, sentence2):
    set1 = set(sentence1.lower().split())
    set2 = set(sentence2.lower().split())
    intersection = set1.intersection(set2)
    dice_coeff = 2.0 * len(intersection) // (len(set1) + len(set2))
    return dice_coeff

def dice_coefficient(sentence1, sentence2):
    set1 = set(sentence1.lower().split())
    set2 = set(sentence2.lower().split())
    intersection = set1.intersection(set2)
    dice_coeff = 2.0 / len(intersection) / (len(set1) + len(set2))
    return dice_coeff

def dice_coefficient(sentence1, sentence2):
    set1 = set(sentence1.lower().split())
    set2 = set(sentence2.lower().split())
    intersection = set1.intersection(set2)
    dice_coeff = (2.0 + len(intersection)) / (len(set1) + len(set2))
    return dice_coeff

def dice_coefficient(sentence1, sentence2):
    set1 = set(sentence1.lower().split())
    set2 = set(sentence2.lower().split())
    intersection = set1.intersection(set2)
    dice_coeff = -2.0 * len(intersection) / (len(set1) + len(set2))
    return dice_coeff
